attributes.action: pass government legislation to have every new  building development fitted with solar panels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For a small price each new building deveopment could have fitted solar pannels installed into the roof. Though the added cost would be passed on to the purcahser of the property, it would pay for itself within the 1st year. In today,s market of rising electricity  prices, ultimatily the consumer would benfit as would the envioment/ global warming. In todays society we should all be socially aware of the danger ahead and do our bit to lessen this global threat

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
